Key Match Events: Lautaro Martínez scored two goals in the 47th and 86th minutes
Post-Match Reflections: Lautaro Martínez expressed his happiness with his performance and stated that he felt ready after a good season at his club
Miscellaneous Highlights: Argentina had already qualified for the quarter-finals before the match
Others: Lionel Messi was absent due to a thigh injury and is expected to return for the quarterfinal match on Thursday
Peru's goalkeeper Pedro Gallese made several saves to keep the scoreline respectable
